item.title: Alibaba Jumps 3% Premarket: Barclays Sees Strong Cloud Growth, Instant Commerce Woes Ending
item.description: Cloud and AI optimism lifted Alibaba’s Hong Kong shares to a nearly four-year high on Tuesday.

item.title: Winklevoss Twins’ Gemini Taps $50M From Nasdaq As Strategic Investment Ahead of IPO: Report
item.description: According to a Reuters report, Nasdaq is expected to buy $50 million in shares in a private placement at the time of its initial public offering.

item.title: Urban Company IPO Opens Tomorrow, Grey Market Premium Surges: SEBI Analyst Calls It A ‘Buy
item.description: Strengths include a strong brand equity, scalable operations, and a first-mover advantage, according to the analyst.

item.title: Teck Resources Stock Jumps Over 8% Premarket After $53B Mega Merger With Anglo American
item.description: The combined company will be known as Anglo Teck Group and will be headquartered in Canada.

item.title: Brigade Launches ₹2,500 Crore Luxury Housing Project In Bengaluru, But Stock Charts Stay Bearish
item.description: Analyst warns that weak momentum indicators limit near-term stock upside.
